name: TimelineHorizontalCardStack
description: Horizontal auto-playing timeline component that displays 2-4 cards in a grid with animated progress bars and optional media display.

description.example: Follow our step-by-step approach to success

itemRules.note: Works best with 2-4 card content children. Grid layout adapts based on item count. Each child is wrapped in card styling with progress bar.

imageSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc per media item

videoSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc per media item

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.mediaItems?: Array<{ imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }>
